If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/191138#issuecomment-2434538640 not reproduced with AdGuard Annoyances / Cookie Notices.
Try to clear browser data, update the filters (wait almost one minute there), open the site.
If that doesn't work, you should re-enable the content blockers in Safari settings (wait about the same time as when you update the filters).

comment.body:
Not reproduced on my end.
Try to clear browser data, update the filters (wait almost one minute there), open the site.
If that doesn't work, you should re-enable the content blockers in Safari settings (wait about the same time as when you update the filters).

comment.body:
According to - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/43001#issuecomment-564659358 and https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/92983#issuecomment-908292189 ads in messenger app cannot be blocked by rules (probably ads are served from the same domain as other content).
As far as I know, these ads are not displayed to all users and might depends on location, so if VPN is used then perhaps app doesn't display them.
